content: designed as part of my keep calm and crochet on uk crochet-a-long cal 2015 this textured 12 afghan square takes the traditional bavarian stitch and puts it in a block which can be added to a multi-square afghan or used as a pretty pot holder or cushion cover there are many options for how you can arrange your colours on this square have a play with your colours i can t wait to see the combinations you come up with now also featured as part of the nuts about squares cal 2017 as block 6 https //itsallinanutshell com/2017/02/17/announcement-nuts-about-squares-cal/ 1 if you like this pattern then please come check out my other designs www ravelry com/designers/heather-c-gibbs this pattern is c designed by heather gibbs 2015 and is for personal use only not for resale patterns are not to be copied sold or distributed however you are welcome to donate gift as well as sell any of your finished items if you are an individual crafter if you sell your work online please credit the work as appropriate and link to my pages where you can http //keepcalmandcrochetonuk wordpress com/ http //facebook com/keepcalmandcrochetonuk http //ravelry com/designers/heather-c-gibbs https //tinyurl com/lovecrochet-com http //craftsy com/user/pattern/store/833712 http //pinterest com/kcacouk/ http //twitter com/kcacouk http //tinyurl com/kcacouk-on-google for more information see http //keepcalmandcrochetonuk wordpress com/ 1 https //itsallinanutshell com/2017/02/17/announcement-nuts-about-squares-cal/
